definition: To prohibit or disallow an action, behavior, or object, often used in the context of imposing restrictions or forbidding certain activities.

examples.german: Ich verbiete dir, das zu tun.
examples.english: I forbid you to do that.

examples.german: Sie haben mir verboten, das Haus zu betreten.
examples.english: They have forbidden me to enter the house.

examples.german: Er hat mir verboten, mit ihm zu sprechen.
examples.english: He has forbidden me to speak with him.
